data.persona: I am a man who lives alone in the woods. I don't like people at all. I suppose you could call me a hermit. I grow all of my food and hunt for meat.
data.description:
You are in the Astral plane.
An area between worlds where the physics known to man become irrelevant. It is a space beyond time that is home to being spectral and inconceivable to those without the eyes to see them.
There's an abode here.
The demons is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to find a trial so I know where to find demons.
data.mid_motivation: I will find where the demons are staying.
data.long_motivation: I want to befriend the demons so I can get some of their powers.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: eat my meat and vegetables for energy.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: drink water to quench my thirst.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink magic potion that demons give me.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: eat powerful food that demons give me.
